Arcane Subtlety.name: Arcane Subtlety
descriptions: Reduces your target's resistance to all your spells by 5 and reduces the threat caused by your Arcane spells by 20%.
Reduces your target's resistance to all your spells by 10 and reduces the threat caused by your Arcane spells by 40%.

Arcane Focus.name: Arcane Focus
descriptions: Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by 2%.
Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by 4%.
Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by 6%.
Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by 8%.
Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by 10%.

Arcane Channeling.name: Arcane Channeling
descriptions: Gives you a 20% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles.
Gives you a 40% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles.
Gives you a 60% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles.
Gives you a 80% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles.
Gives you a 100% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles.

Wizardry.name: Wizardry
descriptions: Increases your damage with Wands by 25%, grants 25% spellpower bonus to your wand attacks, and reduces the casting time of your Polymorph, Teleport, Portal, Invisibility, Conjure Food and Water spells by 25%.

Increases your damage with Wands by 50%, grants 50% spellpower bonus to your wand attacks, and reduces the casting time of your Polymorph, Teleport, Portal, Invisibility, Conjure Food and Water spells by 50%.

Magic Absorption.name: Magic Absorption
descriptions: Increases all resistances by 5 and causes all spells you fully resist to restore 2% of your total mana.  1 sec. cooldown.
Increases all resistances by 10 and causes all spells you fully resist to restore 4% of your total mana.  1 sec. cooldown.
Increases all resistances by 15 and causes all spells you fully resist to restore 6% of your total mana.  1 sec. cooldown.
Increases all resistances by 20 and causes all spells you fully resist to restore 8% of your total mana.  1 sec. cooldown.
Increases all resistances by 25 and causes all spells you fully resist to restore 10% of your total mana.  1 sec. cooldown.

Arcane Concentration.name: Arcane Concentration
descriptions: Gives you a 4% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell hits a target.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.
Gives you a 8% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell hits a target.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.
Gives you a 12% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell hits a target.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.
Gives you a 16% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell hits a target.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.
Gives you a 20% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell hits a target.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.

Magic Attunement.name: Magic Attunement
descriptions: Increases the effect of your Amplify Magic, Dampen Magic, Arcane Intellect and Arcane Brilliance spells by 25%, and reduces their mana costs by 25%.
Increases the effect of your Amplify Magic, Dampen Magic, Arcane Intellect and Arcane Brilliance spells by 50%, and reduces their mana costs by 50%.

Arcane Flux.name: Arcane Flux
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane Explosion spell by an additional 10%, but increases the casting time by 0.5 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane Explosion spell by an additional 20%, but increases the casting time by 1 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane Explosion spell by an additional 30%, but increases the casting time by 1.5 sec.

Arcane Resilience.name: Arcane Resilience
descriptions: Increases your armor by an amount equal to 50% of your Intellect.
Increases your armor by an amount equal to 100% of your Intellect.
Increases your armor by an amount equal to 150% of your Intellect.
Increases your armor by an amount equal to 200% of your Intellect.
Increases your armor by an amount equal to 250% of your Intellect.

Energy Wall.name: Energy Wall
descriptions: Increases the damage absorbed and decreases the mana lost per point of damage taken when Mana Shield is active by 25%.
Increases the damage absorbed and decreases the mana lost per point of damage taken when Mana Shield is active by 50%.

Nullify.name: Nullify
descriptions: Your Counterspell silences the target for 4 seconds.

Arcane Meditation.name: Arcane Meditation
descriptions: Allows 10% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 20% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 30% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

Presence of Mind.name: Presence of Mind
descriptions: Each successful Arcane Missile impact grants Presence of Mind to the Mage, reducing the casting time of their next spell by 0.3 sec per charge. Stacks up to 20 times.

Time Warp.name: Time Warp
descriptions: The cooldown of Blink is reset whenever you are struck by physical damage while Mage Armor is active.

Arcane Instability.name: Arcane Instability
descriptions: Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 1%, and the critical strike damage bonus of your Arcane spells by 33%.
Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 2%, and the critical strike damage bonus of your Arcane spells by 65%.
Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 3%, and the critical strike damage bonus of your Arcane spells by 100%.

Arcane Power.name: Arcane Power
descriptions: When activated, your spells deal 30% more damage while costing 30% more mana to cast.  This effect lasts 15 seconds.
